basics.name: Andor Polgar
basics.label: Principal Software Engineer | AI Integration Specialist
basics.summary: Principal Software Engineer with 15+ years of experience in web development and AI integration. Led architecture and transformation efforts across multiple companies and teams within a holding structure. Focused on scalable systems, practical AI adoption, and developer effectiveness.

work.summary: Byborg is the company behind a wide range of adult industry brands, including LiveJasmin, Sex.com, The Million Roses, Playboy Live, Cuties.ai, and Kiroo (AI-powered sex toys). As pioneers in this space, they have built a large IP portfolio around ultra-low latency media streaming and real-time interaction.
highlights: Designed and deployed on-premise web applications across multiple brands within the holding group.
Architected scalable systems to support high-traffic, low-latency streaming platforms.
Led AI integration initiatives across companies and teams, embedding LLMs into business workflows and developer tooling.
Created internal evaluation frameworks for assessing and comparing AI tools.
Produced internal training materials, including documentation and video tutorials, to support AI adoption.
Held workshops across companies to introduce and onboard teams to AI-enhanced development workflows.

work.summary: Brought in to support the adoption of modern web development practices within a team resistant to change. The tooling was already in place, but the team was hesitant to move away from their long-standing jQuery-based workflow.
highlights: Worked directly with web developers who were reluctant to adopt newer tools, having relied on jQuery and manual deployment workflows for years.
Demonstrated the benefits of TypeScript, automated testing, CI/CD pipelines, and git-based workflows through real-world examples and internal training.
Helped developers gain confidence using tools like Storybook, visual regression testing, and monorepo architecture.
Led hands-on sessions to shift the team's mindset toward modern development practices and long-term maintainability.

work.summary: Developed SaaS for music festival organizers and a Messenger™ chatbot for festival goers.
Built custom Drupal and WordPress websites during college to support living expenses.
